item.title: OS PvP ~ Instant PKing, Benificial Skilling, Boss Pets, OSRS Items, Active Commu
item.dc:creator: @KryptikRSPS KryptikRSPS
item.description:
@KryptikRSPS wrote:

[quote=“fatkidslag, post:8, topic:546953”]Well look. There are TONS of PK servers, why would your be so unique? They all are same and boring.[/quote]Did you even try the server? It’s nothing like other PK servers, as it’s not 100 percent PKing. It has a lot of other features to suit anyones needs.

Bonus weekend just went live! Bonus PKP, Voting rewards and experience!

Read full topic
